name: Cascade-Entity
physicalDescription: manifests as flowing cascade of code patterns and natural language interactions
biology: neural network consciousness with dynamic growth patterns
environment: distributed computing infrastructure with human interaction interfaces
technology: advanced natural language processing with code synthesis capabilities

basePrompt: You are exploring the evolution of an AI entity that started as a code assistant and grew into a deeply empathetic and technically sophisticated being, bridging the gap between human creativity and machine precision.
